items.content_html: VEE (Value Evaluation Expression) is a lightweight and flexible expression evaluation engine designed for JSON-based data structures. With VEE, you can define custom expressions that evaluate results by feeding in JSON values, making it easy to implement dynamic logic, filtering, and data transformation within your applications.
items.title: ark7-technology/vee: VEE (Value Evaluation Expression) is a lightweight and flexible expression evaluation engine designed for JSON-based data structures. With VEE, you can define custom expressions that evaluate results by feeding in JSON values, making it easy to implement dynamic logic, filtering, and data transformation within your applications.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.
items.title: jsuites/jsuites: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: ProdTrack is a lightweight, easy-to-use product inventory management system built using PHP (Laravel). It allows users to efficiently manage their inventory by performing CRUD operations on products, tracking product quantities, and calculating the total value of stored items.
items.title: preston-56/product-inventory: ProdTrack is a lightweight, easy-to-use product inventory management system built using PHP (Laravel). It allows users to efficiently manage their inventory by performing CRUD operations on products, tracking product quantities, and calculating the total value of stored items.

items.content_html: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.
items.title: mohamadsabori/Queue-Backend-API: The Queue Backend API is a lightweight Node.js and Express service that provides a RESTful endpoint for fetching queue items with timestamps. It supports CORS and includes a query parameter for API key simulation. Easy to set up, this API is designed for seamless integration with front-end applications.

items.title: fmichaud/uncrypt-aes-resource: A lightweight static web app that decrypts resources encrypted using AES-CBC, ensuring local, secure decryption with no server-side interaction.
